https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/l6UkF23uWkO25x7UEMnT0H4R5GR.jpg Set in China's underworld, this tale of love and betrayal follows a dancer who fired a gun to protect her mobster boyfriend during a fight. On release from prison 5 years later, she sets out to find him. Ash Is Purest White
